body:
Putain de code ! is a community of passionated developers that want to share their knowledge and experiences.
If you are a developer that loves what you do, you are already part of it.

We like to keep things simple, so contributing to this project should be easy.

There is a lot of different way to help.

We like to keep things simple, so contributing to this project should be easy. [There is a lot of different way to help.](/en/contributing/)
